introduction: An 18 years old U19-Bundesliga player with a pretty girlfriend - that's Jonathan. A gay liar, using girls as an alibi - that's Jonathan too. Torn between the world of football and his sexual orientation, he has to take a decision."Zwei Gesichter" is the first gay-themed film produced by the world's largest national professional sporting body the Deutscher Fußball-Bund, which is in some respect a milestone for German film and German football culture.
